isometric-perspective.settings_main_hint: P: Toggle whether the isometric perspective is applied to the canvas.
isometric-perspective.settings_height_hi: P: Toggle whether token sprites adjust their position to reflect their elevation.
isometric-perspective.settings_visuals_h: P: Displays a circular shadow and a vertical red line to indicate token elevation. Requires 'Enable Height Adjustment' to be active.
isometric-perspective.settings_dynamic_t: P: (BETA FEATURE. USE WITH CAUTION) Adjusts the visibility of tiles dynamically with the positioning of tokens. See how this feature works here.
isometric-perspective.settings_token_sor: P: (BETA FEATURE. USE WITH CAUTION) Automatically adjusts the tokens sort property value when moving it around the canvas.
isometric-perspective.settings_token_sil: P: Adjusts the visibility of tiles dynamically with the positioning of tokens. See how this feature works here.
isometric-perspective.keybindings_increa: P: Increases the opacity of always visible tiles.
isometric-perspective.keybindings_decrea: P: Decreases the opacity of always visible tiles.
isometric-perspective.scene_enableIsomet: P: Enable Isometric for this Scene
isometric-perspective.scene_transform_hi: P: Apply isometric transformation to the background image.
isometric-perspective.scene_scale_hint_1: P: Adjust scale of art in isometric mode (Range: 0.5x to 3x). The "Offset Background (Pixels)" in
isometric-perspective.scene_scale_hint_2: P:  Grid tab can be used to shift/move the background.
isometric-perspective.token_enableIsomet: P: Disable isometric transformation on this token.
isometric-perspective.token_artOffset_hi: P: Offset the token art position in pixels.
isometric-perspective.token_artOffset_mo: P: Hold and drag to fine-tune X and Y
isometric-perspective.token_scale_hint: P: Adjust scale of token art when in isometric perspective (0.01x to 3x).
isometric-perspective.tile_enableIsometr: P: Disable isometric transformation on this tile.
isometric-perspective.tile_artOffset_hin: P: Offset the tile art position in pixels.
isometric-perspective.tile_artOffset_mou: P: Hold and drag to fine-tune X and Y
isometric-perspective.tile_scale_hint: P: Adjust scale of tile art when in isometric perspective (0.01x to 3x).
isometric-perspective.tile_flip_hint: P: Flip the tile art horizontally. Works only with isometric transformation on.
isometric-perspective.tile_link_wall_hin: P: Click the button to select a wall. This wall will be used to determine the tile's visibility for the selected token.
